content: The Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master is a required Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. The leader of the Temple of Yellow Flowers and master of the Spider Guai, he is the final boss of the larger Webbed Hollow region.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Hundred-Eyed_Daoist_Master.md', within the main section titled 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master'.
The content is as follows:
The Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master is a required Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. The leader of the Temple of Yellow Flowers and master of the Spider Guai, he is the final boss of the larger Webbed Hollow region.
